IP.Name: DCMIPP
IP.About: DCMIPP: Digital Camera Module Interface Pixel Pipeline

RefParameter.Name: SwapCyclesPIPE0
RefParameter.Comment: Swap Data from cycle 0 vs cycle 1

RefParameter.Name: PixelPipePitchPIPE0
RefParameter.Description: Number of bytes between the address of 2 consecutive frames

PossibleValue.Comment: Only flow DTIDA from the selected VC is forwaded in the pipe
Flows DTIDA and/or DTIDB from the selected VC are forwarded in the pipe
All data types from the selected VC (except the DTIDA or DTIDB) areforwarded in the pipe, only for Pipe0
All data types of the selected virtual channel VC are forwarded in the pipe,only for Pipe0

RefParameter.Name: SwapCyclesPIPE1
RefParameter.Comment: Swap Data from cycle 0 vs cycle 1

RefParameter.Name: PixelPipePitchPIPE1
RefParameter.Description: Number of bytes between the address of 2 consecutive frames

PossibleValue.Comment: Only flow DTIDA from the selected VC is forwaded in the pipe
Flows DTIDA and/or DTIDB from the selected VC are forwarded in the pipe
All data types from the selected VC (except the DTIDA or DTIDB) areforwarded in the pipe, only for PIPE1
All data types of the selected virtual channel VC are forwarded in the pipe,only for PIPE1

RefParameter.Name: SwapCyclesPIPE2
RefParameter.Comment: Swap Data from cycle 0 vs cycle 1

RefParameter.Name: PixelPipePitchPIPE2
RefParameter.Description: Number of bytes between the address of 2 consecutive frames

PossibleValue.Comment: Only flow DTIDA from the selected VC is forwaded in the pipe
Flows DTIDA and/or DTIDB from the selected VC are forwarded in the pipe
All data types from the selected VC (except the DTIDA or DTIDB) areforwarded in the pipe, only for PIPE2
All data types of the selected virtual channel VC are forwarded in the pipe,only for PIPE2
